name: DeviceType
type: enum
summary: |
  Device category of the client.
description: |
  The DeviceType enum is used to determine the category of devices that a
  client belongs to.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Unknown
    summary: |
      The client is an unknown device.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Desktop
    summary: |
      The client is a desktop device.
    value: 1
    tags: []

  - name: Tablet
    summary: |
      The client is a tablet device.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Phone
    summary: |
      The client is a phone device.
    value: 3
